ingredients: pasta, eggs, cheese, bacon, black pepper
instructions: Cook pasta. In a separate bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Cook bacon and combine everything in a pan. Add pepper to taste.
Prepare the dough. Add tomatoes and mozzarella on top. Bake in the oven. Add basil after baking.
Cook bacon. Toast bread. Assemble the sandwich with bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.
Beat eggs. Melt butter in a pan. Pour eggs and cook. Add cheese before folding the omelette.

ingredients: tomatoes, cucumber, feta cheese, olives, olive oil
instructions: Chop tomatoes and cucumber. Mix with feta cheese and olives. Drizzle olive oil on top.
